articles.content: PORTAGE, Michigan (AP) The first of many freezer-packed COVID-19 vaccine vials made their way to distribution sites across the United States on Sunday, as the nation's pandemic deaths approached the … [+5718 chars]

articles.title: Maine CDC reports 299 new COVID cases, no more deaths - Press Herald
articles.description: Maine added 2,600 cumulative cases and 30 deaths in just one week, and on Sunday it reached 5,000 active cases for the first time. But a vaccine is on the way.
articles.content: The Maine Center for Disease Control and Prevention on Sunday reported 299 cases of the novel coronavirus and no additional deaths as the state races against a rising wave of infections to administer… [+4506 chars]
